project_overrides.description: Project-specific files that intentionally override or extend standards files

allowed_duplicates.reason: Project-specific configuration extends base standards with blog-specific guidelines

generate-og-image.py.purpose: Generate Open Graph images for social sharing

integrate-diagrams.py.purpose: Integrate Mermaid diagrams and optimize code blocks in blog posts

manifest_migrator.py.purpose: Migrate MANIFEST.yaml to MANIFEST.json with complete cataloging

blog-manager.py.purpose: Unified Blog Management Tool for williamzujkowski.github.io

add-tech-images.py.purpose: Add tech-related images to blog posts with proper attribution

fetch-stock-images.py.purpose: Stock Image Fetcher for Blog Posts

remove-hero-images.py.purpose: Remove Generic Hero Images from Blog Posts

diagram-manager.py.purpose: Unified diagram and technical image management for blog posts

final-validation.py.purpose: Final validation of live site after deployment

check-citation-hyperlinks.py.purpose: Check all blog posts for citations that lack hyperlinks

search-reputable-sources.py.purpose: Search for reputable sources using Playwright to back up technical claims in blog posts

optimize-blog-content.py.purpose: Analyze and optimize blog posts for readability by reducing code-to-content ratio

add-academic-citations.py.purpose: Add academic citations to blog posts based on research validation results

batch-improve-blog-posts.py.purpose: Systematically improve all blog posts with diagrams, reduced code, and enhanced content

llm-script-documenter.py.purpose: Automatically add LLM-friendly documentation headers to all Python scripts

research-validator.py.purpose: Research Validator - Ensures all blog post claims are backed by reputable sources

generate-blog-hero-images.py.purpose: Generate Hero Images for Blog Posts

academic-search.py.purpose: Academic Search - Use Playwright to search reputable academic sources

enhance-more-posts-citations.py.purpose: Add academic citations to additional blog posts

add-reputable-sources-to-posts.py.purpose: Add reputable academic sources to blog posts based on Google Scholar findings

vestigial_audit.py.purpose: Comprehensive audit to identify all vestigial content

playwright-image-search.py.purpose: Playwright-based Stock Image Search and Download

analyze-blog-content.py.purpose: Analyze blog posts for content quality metrics and improvement opportunities

add-diagrams-to-live-posts.py.purpose: Add Mermaid diagrams to existing published blog posts

common.py.purpose: Shared utilities for all scripts - DRY/SOLID implementation

mandatory_for_llms: ALWAYS check MANIFEST.json before any operation
NEVER create duplicate files - check file_registry first
MUST update MANIFEST.json after file changes
